data.current_description: The Disposable Email Checker API does checking on a single email address and returns if it is from a disposable email provider in either JSON or XML format.
data.summary_suggestion: Check if email address is from disposable provider
data.description_suggestion: Validates whether a single email address belongs to a disposable email provider. Accepts an email address as input and returns a boolean result indicating disposable status along with provider information if applicable. Supports both JSON and XML response formats. Use this operation to identify temporary or throwaway email addresses that may indicate low-commitment users or spam risk.
